tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CropWaterConsumption (
  crop_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name STRING,
  water_consumption FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE CropData (
   data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   crop_id INT NOT NULL,
   farm_id INT NOT NULL,
   crop_yield FLOAT NOT NULL,
   water_used FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    avg_water_consumption FLOAT
);
CREATE TABLE crop_details (crop_id INT, crop_name VARCHAR(50), water_consumption FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE field_details (field_id INT, field_name VARCHAR(50), crop_id INT, field_area FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE irrigation_logs (log_id INT, field_id INT, irrigation_date DATE, water_used FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (schedule_id INT, crop_id INT, recommended_water FLOAT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE water_source (source_id INT, source_name VARCHAR(50), water_type VARCHAR(50), flow_rate FLOAT);
